# AIoT-SleepApnea-Diagnosis
AIoT Sleep Apnea Monitoring System â€“ An AIoT system supporting the diagnosis of Obstructive Sleep Apnea (OSA). It leverages AI and biosensors to monitor breathing patterns and detect OSA risks. IoT connectivity enables remote monitoring and data storage on the Wise-PaaS platform.
